lead_paragraph: A report in some editions of the Sports Briefing column on Friday about the United States Olympic men’s basketball team misspelled the surname of a player who withdrew from consideration for the team and misspelled the surname of the managing director of USA Basketball. The player is Amare Stoudemire, not Stoudamire, and the managing director is Jerry Colangelo, not Colangleo.
